nav.profileManagement: Manage your profile and account settings.
nav.profileComingSoonDesc: Profile management features including dual-picture layout for joint accounts, background removal options, and advanced settings will be available here.
nav.empoweringFamilies: Empowering families with secure, innovative social networking. Join the future of connected communities.
nav.unlimitedAccess: Enjoy unlimited access with only a small monthly price

auth.kidLoginDescription: For kids: Scan QR code or enter login code
auth.scanOrEnterCode: Scan your QR code or enter the login code provided by your parent
auth.qrScanInstructions: Hold your device's camera up to the QR code displayed by your parent. The login will happen automatically once the code is recognized.
auth.googleAuthComingSoon: Google authentication will be implemented soon!
auth.addExtraSecurity: Enable two-factor authentication to add an extra layer of security to your account.
auth.sendCodeToEmail: We'll send a 6-digit verification code to {{email}}. Enter this code to complete the setup.
auth.sendCodeToPhone: We'll send a 6-digit verification code to your phone number. Make sure your phone number is verified in your account settings.
auth.downloadAuthenticatorApp: Download Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, or similar app. Scan the QR code we'll provide to link your account.
auth.basicInformation: Let's start with your basic information
auth.aiBackgroundDescription: Automatically remove backgrounds from your profile pictures
auth.kidsAccountDescription: Set up accounts for your children with parental controls
auth.childsUsername: Choose a unique username (letters, numbers, dots only)
auth.usernameTooShortHint: Username must be at least 3 characters
auth.almostDone: Almost done! Please review your information
auth.reviewAcceptTerms: Please review and accept our terms
auth.accountReady: Your account will be created and ready to use
auth.createAccountSteps: Create your account in just a few steps

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.firstNameInvalid: First name can only contain letters and spaces
validation.lastNameInvalid: Last name can only contain letters and spaces
validation.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.usernameInvalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and dots
validation.usernameNoDots: Username cannot start or end with a dot
validation.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions
validation.privacyRequired: You must accept the privacy policy
validation.ruleLowercaseOnly: Lowercase letters, numbers, and dots (.) only
validation.ruleNoDotStartEnd: Cannot start or end with a dot
validation.childFirstNameRequired: First name is required for child {{number}}
validation.childLastNameRequired: Last name is required for child {{number}}
validation.childBirthDateRequired: Birth date is required for child {{number}}

groups.startByCreating: Start by creating your first group!
groups.shareIdeasConnect: Share ideas, ask questions, and connect with group members
groups.shareQRCode: Share this QR code to let others join
groups.qrCodeGeneration: QR code generation will be implemented
groups.groupNameTooShort: Group name must be at least 3 characters
groups.descriptionTooShort: Description must be at least 10 characters
groups.gradeLevelsConfigured: Grade levels and specific settings will be configured when creating subgroups (1st grade, 2nd grade, etc.)
groups.educationalDefault: Educational groups default to invitation-only with admin approval
groups.tagsHelpText: Add tags to help people find your group. Tags make your group discoverable in search results and help categorize content.
groups.addTagPlaceholder: Add a tag (e.g., mathematics, science, art)...
groups.groupRulesNote: Group rules can be added after creating the group. This allows you to set up the basic group structure first, then customize rules and settings as needed.
groups.noSubgroupTopics: No Subgroup Topics in this subgroup
groups.subgroupTopicsWillAppear: Subgroup Topics will appear here when created
groups.topicsWillAppear: Topics will appear here when created

groups.createTopicInGroup: Create a topic in this group

groups.whatToAnnounce: What would you like to announce?
groups.announcementVisibleToAll: This announcement will be visible to all group members across all topics they have access to.
groups.announcementPostedToTopic: This announcement will be posted to the selected topic and visible to members with access to that topic.
groups.pleaseSelectTopicToPost: Please select a topic to post this announcement.

invitations.oneOffKidsSubgroupOnly: One-off kid accounts are only available for subgroup invitations
invitations.subgroupInvitationExplanation: This is a subgroup invitation for an educational group. Please select which kid account should join this subgroup. Your parent account will automatically be added as a shadow account.
invitations.educationalGroupExplanation: This is an educational group. Please select which kid account should join.
invitations.createOneOffKidDesc: Don't have a kid account? You can create a temporary kid account specifically for this subgroup invitation.
invitations.createKidAccountFirst: You may need to create a kid account first.

theme.themeInfoDescription: The theme affects the overall appearance of the interface. You can choose between light, dark, or automatic based on your system preferences.

home.nextGenSocial: The next generation of social networking, built for families, with advanced security, AI features, and blockchain integration.
home.platformDescription: We've built a platform that combines the best of social networking with cutting-edge technology for families and communities.
home.jointAccountsDesc: Create shared accounts with your partner, family, or friends. One password, two people, endless possibilities.
home.advancedSecurityDesc: Built-in threat detection, real-time monitoring, and blockchain verification for ultimate trust.
home.kidAccountManagementDesc: Safe, controlled environments for children with parental oversight and educational features.
home.aiPoweredFeaturesDesc: Smart image processing, QR code generation, and intelligent content moderation.
home.multiLanguageSupportDesc: Global accessibility with RTL support for Hebrew and other languages.
home.blockchainIntegrationDesc: Verified accounts and blockchain posts for enhanced trust and authenticity.
home.experienceAdvanced: Experience the most advanced social networking platform designed with families in mind. Secure, intelligent, and innovative.

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.message: You don't have permission to access this page. Please contact an administrator if you believe this is an error.

advancedFeatures.title: Advanced Features
advancedFeatures.accessPowerfulFeatures: Access powerful features for managing your social network experience
advancedFeatures.parentalControls: Parental controls and kid account management
advancedFeatures.managePreferences: Manage your notification preferences and view recent notifications
advancedFeatures.getInstantNotifications: Get instant notifications on your device
advancedFeatures.enhancedSecurityDesc: Advanced security features including MFA, API key management, and encryption tools.
advancedFeatures.aiIntegrationDesc: AI-powered content processing, image enhancement, and smart recommendations.
advancedFeatures.analyticsDesc: Comprehensive analytics and monitoring for system health and performance.
advancedFeatures.globalFeaturesDesc: Multi-language support, RTL languages, and international accessibility.
